LanguageData.BM_SpacerHighExplosiveBurstAbilityModule: A high-tech device that can be installed into any compatible artificial arm or leg replacement. This particular module is capable of producing a powerful explosion around its user by releasing a concoction of volatile chemicals through vent-like openings. While the host is shielded from the blast, any nearby allies or structures will be affected. Syncing with other modules of the same kind allows it to work with greater efficiency.
LanguageData.BM_SpacerFirefoamBurstAbilityModule.desc: A high-tech device that can be installed into any compatible artificial arm or leg replacement. This particular module is capable of ejecting a burst of firefoam through vent-like openings. Syncing with other modules of the same kind allows it to work with greater efficiency.
LanguageData.BM_SpacerSmokeBurstAbilityModule.label: smoke burst module
LanguageData.BM_SpacerSmokeBurstAbilityModule.descrip: A high-tech device that can be installed into any compatible artificial arm or leg replacement. This particular module is capable of producing a cloud of smoke around its user by releasing a concoction of volatile chemicals through vent-like openings. Syncing with other modules of the same kind allows it to work with greater efficiency.
LanguageData.BM_SpacerEMPBurstAbilityModule.label: EMP burst module
LanguageData.BM_SpacerEMPBurstAbilityModule.descripti: A high-tech device that can be installed into any compatible artificial arm or leg replacement. This particular module is capable of producing an EMP blast around its user. While the host is shielded from the blast, any nearby allies or structures will be affected. Syncing with other modules of the same kind allows it to work with greater efficiency.
LanguageData.BM_SpacerIncendiaryBurstAbilityModule.de: A high-tech device that can be installed into any compatible artificial arm or leg replacement. This particular module is capable of producing an incendiary explosion around its user by releasing a concoction of volatile chemicals through vent-like openings. While the host is shielded from the blast, any nearby allies or structures will be affected. Syncing with other modules of the same kind allows it to work with greater efficiency.
